mapper.select: SELECT ss.seckillId, ss.username, ss.name, ss.state, ss.createTime, s.id "seckill.id", s.name "seckill.name", s.number "seckill.number", s.startTime "seckill.startTime", s.endTime "seckill.endTime", s.createTime "seckill.createTime" FROM seckill_successed ss, seckill s WHERE ss.seckillId = s.id AND ss.seckillId = #{seckillId} AND ss.username = #{username}
mapper.insert: INSERT ignore INTO /*主键冲突的时候忽略，不然要报错*/ seckill_successed (seckillId, username, name, state) VALUES (#{seckillId}, #{username}, #{name}, #{state})
